website_summaries.verdict: Soft Care Bear plush that also includes a DVD with a Care Bear episode.
pros: Share Bear stands 12-inches tall and is very soft
Made of quality materials and easy to clean
Includes a DVD that has an episode of the Care Bears TV show
cons: This plush is smaller than classic Care Bears

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. She always has it by her side and sleeps with it. It's a good quality stuffed animal. Biggest draw back is that if you purchase different bears they all come with the same DVD. Now we have 4 copies of the same video. With all the different episodes out there I think they could easily find episodes for the specific bear you purchased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burke

customer_reviews.title: what is not to love about a Care Bare?
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old niece opened it up hugged it, kissed it, and said "AWE" and then put it down and played with the big giant box another toy came in. But her mother assures me that she loves it and it has been added to her sleepy time collection, of her lady bug and her musical sea horse. sounds like a winner too me.
customer_reviews.author: PamR

customer_reviews.title: Soft, squishy, perfect teddy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is obsessed with Care Bears. This was her Santa gift for Christmas and she hasn't put him down since. He is soft, cuddly, just the right size for little hands. He's had chocolate milk spilled on him and has gone through the washer and dryer with no ill effects. We will be buying a few more Hasbro bears for her birthday, great quality stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great lesson was worked in with this gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter when we were having trouble with sharing. Taught her all about share bear. Great lesson was worked in with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Danaea Hagopian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this care bear. She has slept with it every night since i bought it for her. I did however, get it on sale for 17 bucks.... ive seen the price as high as 40 bucks for this bear... i personally wouldnt pay more than 20 for it. :) But its a super cute bear, soft, fluffy. A great addition to any care bear collection :)
customer_reviews.author: Sum Day

customer_reviews.title: Share Bear with DVD was Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for one of my grandkids. It was a big hit! All other gifts were abandoned in favor of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Found it cheaper after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I found it cheaper at wallmart, but owell... The care bear is still great quality and the kiddos love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio L.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and exact item I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 4 year old niece because I had one when I was a kid. The bear came wrapped in plastic with a dvd. I think this is the perfect size for a toddler or small child. Ordered and received you within 2 days!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Best Share 🐻
customer_reviews.text: Best Share 🐻, I love it 💯💕. Share 🐻 xoxoxo she's a keeper and I have to admit, being a Care Bear fan and family members is a good idea and positive vibes to you and me both I love the Care Bear's. Thanks again 💯🇺🇸😀😘
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mmrl Rabe

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and plush
customer_reviews.text: Paired this little bear with matching PJs and soft throw (all available here at Amazon) for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Eli
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my niece little baby girl and she says she loved it always caries it with her while she’s playing or sleeping or eating.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: The bear is cute, the DVD it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: The bear is cute, the DVD it came with was pointless. It has one short episode and frustrates my children. Thankfully the series is on Netflix so it is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: jamn4evr

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it mostly
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with it mostly. However, it is not as soft as the ones I have found in store. I might buy the other and give this as a gift to someone else. It's just not as plush as the ones I've seen. But I do like that it comes with a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bear is cute and has held up well. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: C. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift 🎁
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved her care bear. She was so happy he was soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nash Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Just what child wanted for birthday!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and quality item. Comperable to store puchase . A little more expensive that Wal-Mart but quick and easy to buy on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Page

customer_reviews.title: THIS MADE FOR A HAPPY CHRISTMAS THANKS TO AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my three year old niece for Christmas. "Santa" brought her the yellow Care Bear on Christmas Eve which she liked but when she had finished opening all her presents she told her mom - "I didn't get the Share Bear". One Christmas Day the whole family got together to have the "Family Christmas" and that is when she got this bear. This made her Christmas - she yelled "My Share Bear". Happy Share Bear Purchaser
customer_reviews.author: M Scott

customer_reviews.title: My grandaugter is going to love this care bear
customer_reviews.text: My grandaugter is going to love this care bear. Perfect size, perfect color and it hss a DVD. Can't wait until she opens it for Christmas she will be so excited.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to care for. Just throw it in the washer and it will come out brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Martin De La Plum

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Share bear is her favorite from that show and she enjoyed unwrapping it as a present on Christmas and has been showing it off to her other doll and teddy bear friends
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Care Bear good job!🌟
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughters eye lite up. She is 5 and takes it to bed with her every night...looked great coming out of the package she was going to watch the DVDS the next day...
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old niece after watching the Care Bears movie with her. She absolutely loves it! Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: This was our granddaughter's favorite Care Bear at the time so she was thrilled
customer_reviews.text: This was our granddaughter's favorite Care Bear at the time so she was thrilled. . .she like the DVD also.
customer_reviews.author: Maltby

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old recently became obsessed with Care Bears so I was on the hunt to find her some Care Bear toys. I found this on Amazon and bought this specific one mainly because it was so much cheaper than the other bears. It didn't hurt that it was purple, either. I had never seen any Care Bear stuffed toys in stores, so I was happy to buy this on Amazon. I was even more happy to see it in Target last week for more money. My daughter loves it and takes it with her everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: perfect for cuddles
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I hoped! Very soft and cuddly it was the perfect "Santa"gift for my four year old. She still plays and hugs it constantly :-)
customer_reviews.author: Monica K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Care Bears Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Care Bear for my great-niece who absolutely loves her bear so it was a very successful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Actually is't not me that loved it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her care bear and she doesn't leave home without. She talks and sings like the care bear it is way to cute.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's care bear got stolen by a dog and when all else failed amazon to the rescue, this bear is a pretty good size and it comes with a DVD great price for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline H. Hunterton-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my kids loved the care bear dvd that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Van Hammer

customer_reviews.title: like it had been on a shelf for years
customer_reviews.text: It looked old, like it had been on a shelf for years.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dombroski

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I Bought This Because I Love The Care Bears And It Was Just As It Said It Was Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Plush, cute style and color. The DVD was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Angela J. Findle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: small and not as nice as first generation care bares
customer_reviews.author: cool gram

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. When she opened it on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Share Bear care bear for my granddaughter. She loved it. When she opened it on Christmas, the expression on her face let me know I had gotten the right gift. The bear is well made and just the right size for an eighteen month old.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter LOVES this thing. She hauls it around everywhere she goes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kimbrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it, especially when she saw her bear on the DVD!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size! Much smaller than the Care Bears we had as kids, but I think the size is perfect. My baby girl received it on her first birthday and was delighted. My 2.5 year old boy has carried it around the house non-stop. I haven't watched the movie yet, but I believe it's the newer Care Bear series, which I'm not as huge of a fan of. But, I really don't care b/c the doll alone is worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. My granddaughter loves it!! She loves the bear. Takes it everywhere with her & sleeps with it. Loves the DVD too!
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very very happy to receive this bear; it was exactly what she wanted. We were upset though that when we ordered 2 different bears that the DVD's were exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was 7 when I got this for her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dusti Heath

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for All Care Bear Fans
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and a great product. My daughter (5) doesn't put Share Bear down! She has withstood the test of an adventurous little girl. The DVD has three videos, including one featuring My Little Pony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It appears to be made well and should handle lots of hugs and tugs. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pry

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves the care bears so he was super excited to get this for xmas. His face lit up when he opened it and plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: julie rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, just not what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I had imagined. Nice product, just not what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: After my daughter saw a care bear at a friends house I knew I had toget her one. It came in fast and she loves it, it's soft cuddly and a great bedtime toy.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Great combo!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and really enjoys the dvd. She wants to watch it over and over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES it and the DVD
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old daughter loves the bear and the video. Only a few negatives: bear isn't shaped as nicely as the picture. It's not the big bear, but more of a 'toddler' sized bear. And the DVD centers around another purple bear named Harmony, which is confusing for my 3 year old, would have thought the DVD would have centered around share bear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We gave this to my daughter for Christmas and the ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my daughter for Christmas and the seam in the back has already come unsewed. So now her bear has a big hole in its back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tuxhorn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come with the listed DVD that was supposed to be included with the Care Bear. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bear!
customer_reviews.text: This bear is the perfect size for my 4 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was so adorable. My 3 year old granddaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Little smaller than the ones when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Little smaller than the ones when I was a kid...but very cute!
customer_reviews.author: jennyl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what looking for
customer_reviews.text: Cute bear. Great shape and good size. Have been looking for one and all in all best I've found for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Liza L Riley

customer_reviews.title: she loved it. It came as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece, she loved it. It came as described, though I thought it looked a little shabby, like it may have been sitting in a storage unit for years. Thought it was expensive for a stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Share Bear Plush
customer_reviews.text: Great Care Bear memories are brought back as my son is starting to learn about the Care Bears and their Cousins. This plush is so soft, and has really good colors, with great stitching on the tummy symbol. He loves to cuddle Share Bear at bed time, and they go on adventures together during the day. :)
customer_reviews.author: luckypooka

product_meta.title: Care Bears Share 12" Bear Toy with DVD
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Make a really special friend with this adorable plush Share Bear toy! Your soft, sweet Share Bear friend will share everything with you, and her kind ways will make her the perfect pal for all your Care Bears adventures. She's got a "magical" lollipop design on her soft, plushy tummy. Watch the full TV episode and other features on the included DVD! Your Share Bear buddy can’t wait to snuggle and play with you! Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Hasbro officially licensed Care Bear product
Super soft plush stuffed Care Bears
Includes DVD with a full Care Bears TV episode and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
